title: Locks & Deadlocks
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
- **Shared Lock**: For Reading. Multiple allowed.
- **Exclusive Lock**: For Writing. Only 1 allowed.
**2PL Protocol**: Acquire all locks (Growing), then release all (Shrinking). Guarantees Serializability.

interview_questions.question: What is 2PL?
interview_questions.answer: Protocol ensuring serializability. Disadvantage: Cascading Rollbacks and Deadlocks possible.
